name: Sacred Fire
description:
This is my jam-game for the Ludum Dare 46 I did during the covid19 lockdown, like all of you guys. It was great focusing on just the jam, the pleasure to create even if I was alone.
So this game is about almost losing the Sacred Fire and a chance to make it triumph in the end... 
Cheers and stay safe
Thierry 
PS the image is not what will be in the game it's a drawing of my friend Logan and I put it here as I love it, it just described me during those 72 hours!
